trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl"></xref> class is used with <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref> to instruct the server to sort the search results before returning them to the client application.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey[])"></xref> constructor creates and initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified sort keys.
An array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey"></xref> objects used by the server to sort the search results before returning them to the client.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)"></xref> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified attribute name and sort order.
The name of the attribute on which the query is based.
`true` if results should be returned in reverse order or `false` otherwise.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)"></xref> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified attribute name, matching rule, and sort order.
The name of the attribute on which the query is based.
Specifies the object identifier (OID) of the matching rule for the sort.
`true` if the sort is ordered from lowest to highest or `false` if the sort is ordered from highest to lowest.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl.GetValue"></xref> method specifies the sort keys and matching rules for this control.
The sort keys and matching rules for this control.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortRequestControl.SortKeys"></xref> property contains an array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey"></xref> objects used by the server to sort the search results before returning them to the client.
An array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey"></xref> objects used by the server to sort the search results before returning them to the client.
